snippet: The government on Monday will begin to retry Roger Clemens in his perjury case, after a critical gaffe by the prosecution last summer irritated the judge and led to a mistrial.
abstract: Retrial is set to begin in perjury case against Roger Clemens, seven-time CY Young Award winner who is charged with making false statements and obstruction of Congress; Clemens faces a maximum of 30 years in prison if convicted on all counts; government contends that he used performance-enhancing drugs during his career and that he lied about that drug use when he testified to Congress in 2008.
lead_paragraph: The government on Monday will begin to retry Roger Clemens in his perjury case, after a critical gaffe by the prosecution last summer irritated the judge and led to a mistrial.

headline.seo: Roger Clemens Retrial Set to Begin With Strike 1 on Prosecutors
headline.main: Clemens Retrial Set to Begin With Prosecutors on Notice
headline.print_headline: Clemens Retrial Set to Begin With Prosecutors on Notice
